                                # ğŸš€ Installation

                                Tips

                                Require: PHP >= 7.1

                                # Installation

                                Installation is very simple as it is a standard Composeropen in new window package, which can be installed directly using the following command.

                                composer require zjkal/time-helper

                                # Update

                                composer update
